Kayako - ticket id 60230887 // ATLAS commented publicly: Dear Varun,

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are currently aware of an ongoing incident affecting Community Analytics data for the EMEA region, which may be impacting your ability to access the csv data files via SFTP since October 21st, 2025.

For the latest updates and information on the progress of this incident, please refer to our status page [https://stspg.io/7tn8nft5gjjh]. Our teams are actively working on backfilling the missing data and restoring normal operations.

If you continue to experience issues after the incident has been resolved, please feel free to reach out to us again. We are here to help.

Sincerely, 
ATLAS 
Khoros Community Classic Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Closed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.
Kayako - ticket id 60230887 // ATLAS commented privately: Responding to active incident
